L

Level - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level
Holds the loaded level image (Level.bitmap) which is intended to be drawn, a LevelInfo object (Level.levelInfo) and an array of collectables (Level.collectables) which are read from the collision image (LevelInfo.collisionResource).
Level(Context, LevelInfo) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.Level
Loads the level image and the collision image according to Level.levelInfo.
LEVEL_COUNT - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionActivity
The number of levels.
levelInfo - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.GameSurfaceView
Current level info.
levelInfo - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.Level
LevelInfo for this level
LevelInfo - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level
Holds general information about a level like the number, a score object and a pointer to the level image and collision image.
LevelInfo(int, Highscores.Score, int, int) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.level.LevelInfo
Constructs a LevelInfo object with the given parameters.
LevelInfoAdapter - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui
The bridge between the level data and the ListView contained in activity_level_selection.xml.
LevelInfoAdapter(Context, int, List<LevelInfo>) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui.LevelInfoAdapter
 
levelMatrix - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.GameSurfaceView
Transformation of the level on the screen.
LevelResultActivity - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight
Fullscreen activity displayed after finishing a level.
LevelResultActivity() - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelResultActivity
 
levels - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionActivity
Contains a LevelInfo object for each level.
LevelSelectionActivity - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight
Fullscreen activity for level selection.
LevelSelectionActivity() - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionActivity
 
linear(float, float, float) - Static method in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui.Animation
Linear animation.
lives - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.Player
Number of lives the player has left.
loadLevels() - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.LevelSelectionActivity
Iterates through the image resources levelx and levelxcollision, where x is LevelInfo.number - 1, queries the score (best time and highscore) from the database and adds a LevelInfo object containing these variables for each level to the levels list LevelSelectionActivity.levels.
loop - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.Sprite
Whether to loop the animation.
